bug.author: PeterisP
bug.description:
Tutorial <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/tutorials/wide_and_deep/index.html>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/tutorials/wide_and_deep/index.html</denchmark-link> refers to tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column. No documentation for this is available at API docs <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/contrib.layers.html>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/contrib.layers.html</denchmark-link>
The same applies for tf.contrib.learn.DNNLinearCombinedClassifier used later in that tutorial.
